description: With flaky pastry and juicy steak, this mini beef wellingtons recipe with creamy mashed potatoes is the perfect meal for two.
keywords: Mini Beef Wellingtons With Garlic Mash
name: Mini Beef Wellingtons With Garlic Mash Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Meanwhile, place potato and garlic in a medium saucepan. Cover with cold water. Bring to the boil over high heat. Cook for 15 minutes or until tender when pierced with a fork. Drain. Return to pan over low heat and toss for 1 minute or until excess liquid has evaporated. Remove from heat. Using a potato masher, roughly mash. Add milk and butter. Mash until smooth. Season. Serve beef Wellingtons with mash, gravy and snow peas.

Serve beef Wellingtons with mash, gravy and snow peas.
